meanings.definition: A traditional Indonesian soy product made from fermented soybeans.
meanings.sent1: My friend brought some tempeh to the potluck.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy cooking with tempeh because it adds a unique flavor to dishes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tempeh refuse to dance? It was too busy fermenting!
meanings.sent4: The tempeh in the fridge was a science experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked tempeh filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A meat substitute often used in vegetarian and vegan cooking.
meanings.sent1: Tempeh is a great source of protein for vegetarians.
meanings.sent2: I like to marinate tempeh before grilling it for a tasty meal.
meanings.sent3: The tempeh at the store looked so realistic, I almost thought it was meat!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in using tempeh as a meat alternative was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The tempeh sandwich was a hit at the picnic.
